trans-unit.source: A trigger action that changes the speed of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
Use a SetStoryboardSpeedRatio action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively control a storyboard's speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: SetStoryboardSpeedRatio 동작으로 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>대화형으로 제어할 스토리 보드의 속도 비율.</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> property of SetStoryboardSpeedRatio to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>SetStoryboardSpeedRatio 새 지정 하려면 속성 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>애니메이션 속도 이전 애니메이션 속도의 비율로.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>속도 두 배 하면 2로는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>애니메이션 속도 50%까지 줄일 값이 0.5로 설정 하면.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: This object affects the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> at anytime after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> begins.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체에 영향을 줍니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>에서 후 언제 든 지는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>시작.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you pause the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> and use the SetStoryboardSpeedRatio, when you resume the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, it uses the new speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 일시 중지 하면는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>SetStoryboardSpeedRatio, 다시 시작할 때 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, 새 속도 비율을 사용 하 여.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>, which controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지, 다시 시작, 중지 또는 스토리 보드에 대화형으로 수 일시 중지, 제어 그렇지 않으면 다시 시작 하거나 다른 방식으로 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>대화형으로 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>속성의 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>개체 (같은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> 참조 하 여 제어할 수</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>지정 되어 있지는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>으로 시작한 후에 대화형으로 제어할 수 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 참조 [하는 방법: 한 스토리 보드 후 시작을 제어 하려면 이벤트 트리거를 사용 하 여](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 자세한 정보에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나 새 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> 애니메이션 속도 비율 이전 애니메이션 속도입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 사용 하 여 새 지정 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>애니메이션 속도 이전 애니메이션 속도의 비율로.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the SpeedRatio to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어는 동안 2로 설정 하면 두 번의 속도 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>애니메이션 속도 50%까지 줄일 값이 0.5로 설정 하면.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>
